parameters.query:
WITH input AS (
  SELECT $1::uuid AS usuario_id
),
estado AS (
  SELECT
    uc.usuario_id,
    uc.sequencia_atual,
    uc.sequencia_recorde,
    uc.meta_sequencia_codigo,
    uc.proxima_meta_codigo,
    uc.ultima_conversa_em,
    uc.sequencia_status
  FROM public.usuarios_conquistas uc
  JOIN input i ON i.usuario_id = uc.usuario_id
),
base AS (
  SELECT * FROM estado
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    i.usuario_id,
    0,
    0,
    'streak_003',
    'streak_005',
    NULL,
    '{}'::jsonb
  FROM input i
  WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM estado)
)
SELECT
  'sequencia'::text AS bloco,
  b.usuario_id AS user_id,
  b.sequencia_atual,
  b.sequencia_recorde,
  b.meta_sequencia_codigo,
  b.proxima_meta_codigo,
  b.ultima_conversa_em,
  b.sequencia_status,
  COALESCE((regexp_match(b.meta_sequencia_codigo, '\\d+'))[1]::int, 3) AS meta_alvo_dias,
  COALESCE((regexp_match(b.proxima_meta_codigo, '\\d+'))[1]::int, 5) AS proxima_meta_dias,
  base_meta.xp_recompensa AS xp_base_diaria,
  meta_atual.xp_recompensa AS xp_bonus_meta,
  meta_atual.titulo AS meta_atual_titulo,
  meta_prox.xp_recompensa AS xp_bonus_proxima_meta,
  meta_prox.titulo AS meta_prox_titulo
FROM base b
LEFT JOIN public.metas_catalogo base_meta ON base_meta.codigo = 'conversa_diaria'
LEFT JOIN public.metas_catalogo meta_atual ON meta_atual.codigo = b.meta_sequencia_codigo
LEFT JOIN public.metas_catalogo meta_prox ON meta_prox.codigo = b.proxima_meta_codigo;
